sentences.en: A glider can soar for many miles.
sentences.cn: 滑翔机可以滑行好多英里.

sentences.en: Adam’s smile sent her spirits soaring .
sentences.cn: 亚当的微笑让她飘飘然了。

sentences.en: Borrowing is set to soar to an astonishing ￡60 billion.
sentences.cn: 借款很可能猛增至惊人的600亿英镑.

sentences.en: Buzzards soar overhead at a great height.
sentences.cn: 秃鹰在高空翱翔。

sentences.en: Conversation on such an occasion is not expected to soar above polite commonplaces.
sentences.cn: 不能指望在这种场合的谈话会超越平常的客套.

sentences.en: Great trees soar above to cut out most of the light.
sentences.cn: 大树参天,把光线差不多都挡住了.

sentences.en: Her soul seemed to soar over the plain Aileen inhabited.
sentences.cn: 她的灵魂仿佛在爱玲居住地的上空翱翔.

sentences.en: Her temperature soared.
sentences.cn: 她的体温骤然升高。

sentences.en: If the birds have not flown for three years , they will soar into the clouds . If they have not sung for three years, their songs will take everyone by surprise.
sentences.cn: 三年不蜚, 蜚将冲天; 三年不鸣, 鸣将惊人.

sentences.en: If you're lucky, a splendid golden eagle may soar into view.
sentences.cn: 幸运的话，会有一只光彩夺目的金雕飞入你的视野。

sentences.en: Insurance claims are expected to soar.
sentences.cn: 预计保险索赔数量会急剧增加。

sentences.en: She watched the dove soar above the chestnut trees.
sentences.cn: 她看着鸽子在栗子树的上空展翅飞翔。

sentences.en: Skyscrapers soar above the horizon.
sentences.cn: 摩天大楼拔地而起高耸入云.

sentences.en: soaring unemployment
sentences.cn: 急剧上升的失业率

sentences.en: The colossus would soar higher into the sky.
sentences.cn: 这庞然大物高耸入云.

sentences.en: The Commissioners get between £50,000 and 60,000 a year in various allowances. But that amount can soar to 90,000 a year.
sentences.cn: 委员们每年领取的各种津贴在5万到6万英镑之间，但最高可达9万英镑。

sentences.en: The eagle can soar without flapping their wings.
sentences.cn: 老鹰无需振翼就能翱翔.

sentences.en: The price of petrol has soared in recent weeks.
sentences.cn: 最近几个星期汽油价格猛涨。

sentences.en: The temperature in the south will soar into the hundreds.
sentences.cn: 南方的温度会上升到一百多度。

sentences.en: Were it but free, it would soar cloud - high.
sentences.cn: 只要它一旦自由了, 就会在高高的云端里飞翔.

words.tran_cn: 高耸（soar的现在分词形式）；高飞；猛增

trans.tran_en: to increase quickly to a high level

trans.tran_cn: 高飞，飞腾，猛增，剧增，高耸，屹立
trans.tran_en: to increase quickly to a high level
